ValidationRule.description: Closed won requirements that apply to traditional enrollment opps only
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( !$User.Bypass_Validation__c,
LEFT( RecordTypeId , 15) = LEFT( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15),
ispickval(StageName, "Closed Won"),
or( isblank(text(Post_Verto_Plans__c)), Approval_Process_Active__c, isblank( Approval_Process_Completion_Date__c) ),
or( ischanged(StageName), ischanged(Post_Verto_Plans__c), ischanged(Approval_Process_Active__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the Post-Verto Plans are selected and that the admissions decision approval process is complete.
